With the help of pre-existing [[sand]], the user creates a localised [[wikipedia:sandstorm|sandstorm]], surrounding opponents and limiting their sense of vision.

== Trivia ==

* Although in the anime this technique is used without any indication of the chakra nature, in the game it requires the use of [[Wind Release]].
